services.whyChooseMe: Why choose AI + React + SPA development?

whyAiSpa.description: I explain in simple terms why my approach with AI, React and Single Page Applications delivers better results than traditional development.

benefit1.title: AI Development Speed
benefit1.description: AI technologies allow creating a website in 3-5 days instead of weeks. Automatic code, component and style generation. Faster to market - more customers.

benefit2.title: React = Instant Speed
benefit2.description: React creates virtual DOM for lightning-fast page updates. SPA loads in 1-2 seconds, further navigation is instant. Visitors don't leave.

benefit3.title: What is SPA and why is it cool?
benefit3.description: Single Page Application is a website that loads once and then works like a mobile app. No page reloads, everything works instantly.

benefit4.title: Fixed Price $300
benefit4.description: No surcharges, hidden payments. Everything included: AI development, React SPA, hosting, setup, support.

benefit5.title: Analytics from Day One
benefit5.description: Get detailed statistics on visitors, traffic sources, conversions. Know what works and how much you earn.

benefit6.title: Easy Management
benefit6.description: React components are easy to edit. You can change texts and images yourself. First edits are free of charge.

faq.description: Answers to the most common questions about creating SPA websites with AI and setting up Google tools.
faq.question1: What is SPA and why is it better?
faq.answer1: SPA (Single Page Application) is a website that loads once and then works like a mobile app. On React this means instant navigation, no page reloads. Users get better experience, and you get higher conversion.
faq.question2: How long does it take to create a SPA website with AI?
faq.answer2: Usually 3-5 business days. AI significantly speeds up React component development, but I always check quality and manually configure all Google tools for the best results.
faq.question3: What exactly is included in the $300 price?
faq.answer3: Complete package: AI React SPA development, responsive design, SEO optimization, Google Ads setup, Analytics, Tag Manager, hosting for a year, and basic tech support for a month.
faq.question4: Do I need to do anything during development?
faq.answer4: Minimum! You provide content (texts, photos) and branding, and I do everything else. I periodically show intermediate results for approval.
faq.answer5: 100% guarantee of functionality, loading speed under 3 seconds, responsiveness on all devices. If something doesn't work - I fix it for free.
faq.question6: Will I be able to edit content myself?
faq.answer6: Yes! React components are easy to edit. I'll set up a simple content management system or teach you to work with files. You can also ask for help - first edits are free.
faq.question7: What to do after the website launch?
faq.answer7: I'll set up automatic analytics and advertising. You'll receive instructions on working with Google panels and promotion recommendations.
faq.question8: Do you work with all business niches?
faq.answer8: Yes! E-commerce, services, B2B, restaurants, clinics - AI allows quick adaptation to any field. React components are easily customizable for any business.
